template.name: Template pve api datacenter
template.description: This template monitors a Proxmox system. It requires access to port 8006 either from the zabbix server or from a zabbix proxy. It will not work through a zabbix agent. The template requires a Proxmox API key for access to the Proxmox API. The values should be set in the following macro's: {$PVESERVER} : Server to talk to for the API {$PVETOKENID} : API token ID {$PVESECRET} : API secret

item.name: pveapi datacenter master resources
item.description: Item specifically does not use cluster/config/nodes as that has no information for single node systems.

template.name: Template pve api lxc
template.description: This template is used by Template pve api datacenter. Please don't use directly.

trigger_prototype.expression: now()- last(/Template pve api lxc/pveapi.lxc.snapshot.time[{#PVELXCSNAPSHOT}])>{$PVESNAPSHOTAGE} and last(/Template pve api lxc/pveapi.lxc.snapshot.check[{#PVELXCSNAPSHOT}])=1
trigger_prototype.name: {$PVELXCNAME} snapshot {#PVELXCSNAPSHOT} too old

template.name: Template pve api node
template.description: This template is used by Template pve api datacenter. Please don't use directly.

trigger_prototype.name: {$PVENODE} lvm thin metadata {#PVENODELVMTHIN} less then 2% free
{$PVENODE} lvm thin metadata {#PVENODELVMTHIN} less then 10% free
{$PVENODE} lvm thin metadata {#PVENODELVMTHIN} less then 20% free

template.name: Template pve api qemu
template.description: This template is used by Template pve api datacenter. Please don't use directly.

discovery_rule.name: pveapi qemu discovery blockdevice
discovery_rule.description: Discover blockdevices for qemu. The preprocessing is pretty gross. Need to modify an array to items with names.

discovery_rule.name: pveapi qemu discovery nic
discovery_rule.description: Discover network interfaces for qemu. The preprocessing is pretty gross. Need to modify an array to items with names.

trigger_prototype.expression: now()- last(/Template pve api qemu/pveapi.qemu.snapshot.time[{#PVEQEMUSNAPSHOT}])>{$PVESNAPSHOTAGE} and last(/Template pve api qemu/pveapi.qemu.snapshot.check[{#PVEQEMUSNAPSHOT}])=1
trigger_prototype.name: {$PVEQEMUNAME} snapshot {#PVEQEMUSNAPSHOT} too old

template.name: Template pve api settings
template.description: This template only contains configuration macro's with default values.

macro.description: Alert if lxc or qemu is locked for this long
Alert if snapshots older than 1 week (default)
Ignore snapshots starting with this text
Alert if tasks fail between now and value seconds ago
Systems in this pool will not generate triggers

trigger.expression: avg(/Template pve api lxc/pveapi.lxc.cpu,15m)>80 and last(/Template pve api lxc/pveapi.lxc.poolcheck)=1
trigger.name: CPU over 80% for last 15 minutes on {$PVELXCNAME}
trigger.description: {$PVELXCNAME} has more then 80% CPU usage over the last 15 minutes

trigger.expression: (avg(/Template pve api node/pveapi.node.cpu.user,15m) + avg(/Template pve api node/pveapi.node.cpu.wait,15m)) > 80
trigger.recovery_expression: (avg(/Template pve api node/pveapi.node.cpu.user,15m) + avg(/Template pve api node/pveapi.node.cpu.wait,15m)) < 70
trigger.name: CPU over 80% for last 15 minutes on {$PVENODE}
trigger.description: {$PVENODE} has more then 80% CPU usage over the last 15 minutes

trigger.expression: avg(/Template pve api qemu/pveapi.qemu.cpu,15m)>80 and last(/Template pve api qemu/pveapi.qemu.poolcheck)=1
trigger.name: CPU over 80% for last 15 minutes on {$PVEQEMUNAME}
trigger.description: {$PVEQEMUNAME} has more then 80% CPU usage over the last 15 minutes

trigger.expression: avg(/Template pve api lxc/pveapi.lxc.diskfree,10m)<1 and last(/Template pve api lxc/pveapi.lxc.poolcheck)=1
trigger.name: Disk full on {$PVELXCNAME}
trigger.description: {$PVELXCNAME} has no diskspace left over the last 10 minutes.

trigger.expression: avg(/Template pve api lxc/pveapi.lxc.diskfree,10m)<5 and last(/Template pve api lxc/pveapi.lxc.poolcheck)=1
trigger.name: Disk less than 5% free on {$PVELXCNAME}
trigger.description: {$PVELXCNAME} has less then 5% diskspace free over the last 10 minutes.

trigger.expression: avg(/Template pve api lxc/pveapi.lxc.diskfree,10m)<10 and avg(/Template pve api lxc/pveapi.lxc.diskfree,10m)>5 and last(/Template pve api lxc/pveapi.lxc.poolcheck)=1
trigger.name: Disk less than 10% free on {$PVELXCNAME}
trigger.description: {$PVELXCNAME} has less then 10% diskspace free over the last 10 minutes.

trigger.expression: avg(/Template pve api lxc/pveapi.lxc.memfree,10m)<5 and last(/Template pve api lxc/pveapi.lxc.poolcheck)=1
trigger.name: Memory less than 5% free on {$PVELXCNAME}
trigger.description: {$PVELXCNAME} has less then 5% memory + swap free over the last 10 minutes.

trigger.name: Memory less than 5% free on {$PVENODE}
trigger.description: {$PVENODE} has less then 5% memory + swap free over the last 10 minutes.

trigger.expression: avg(/Template pve api qemu/pveapi.qemu.memfree,10m)<5 and last(/Template pve api qemu/pveapi.qemu.poolcheck)=1
trigger.name: Memory less than 5% free on {$PVEQEMUNAME}
trigger.description: {$PVEQEMUNAME} has less then 5% memory free over the last 10 minutes.

trigger.expression: (100* (avg(/Template pve api node/pveapi.node.rootfs.used,10m) / avg(/Template pve api node/pveapi.node.rootfs.total,10m))) > 90
trigger.recovery_expression: (100* (avg(/Template pve api node/pveapi.node.rootfs.used,10m) / avg(/Template pve api node/pveapi.node.rootfs.total,10m))) < 80
trigger.name: RootFS has less than 10% free on {$PVENODE}
trigger.description: {$PVENODE} has less then 10% diskspace free over the last 10 minutes

trigger.name: Swap more than 50% used on {$PVENODE}
trigger.description: {$PVENODE} has less then 5% memory + swap free over the last 10 minutes.

trigger.expression: (count(/Template pve api lxc/pveapi.lxc.lock,{$PVELOCKTIME}) = count(/Template pve api lxc/pveapi.lxc.lock,{$PVELOCKTIME},"ne","")) and last(/Template pve api lxc/pveapi.lxc.poolcheck)=1
trigger.name: {$PVELXCNAME} is locked: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}

trigger.expression: change(/Template pve api lxc/pveapi.lxc.uptime)<0 and find(/Template pve api lxc/pveapi.lxc.status,,"regexp","running")=1 and last(/Template pve api lxc/pveapi.lxc.poolcheck)=1
trigger.name: {$PVELXCNAME} is restarted

trigger.expression: find(/Template pve api lxc/pveapi.lxc.status,,"regexp","stopped")=1 and last(/Template pve api lxc/pveapi.lxc.poolcheck)=1
trigger.name: {$PVELXCNAME} is stopped

trigger.expression: change(/Template pve api qemu/pveapi.qemu.uptime)<0 and last(/Template pve api qemu/pveapi.qemu.poolcheck)=1
trigger.name: {$PVEQEMUNAME} is restarted

trigger.expression: find(/Template pve api qemu/pveapi.qemu.status,,"regexp","stopped")=1 and last(/Template pve api qemu/pveapi.qemu.poolcheck)=1
trigger.name: {$PVEQEMUNAME} is stopped
